meta.reasoning: Successfully implemented all remaining button functionalities from the design review using the latest Expo SDK 55 packages: (1) Camera Capture - Full CameraCapture component with expo-camera, permission handling, front/back toggle, flash modes (off/on/auto), image optimization via expo-image-manipulator (resize to 1200px, 80% quality JPEG). (2) File Upload - Document picker with expo-document-picker supporting multiple files, displays file chips with remove buttons. (3) Image Optimization - Automatic optimization for all images from gallery or camera using expo-image-manipulator. (4) Web Search (Globe) - Functional button that prefixes query with 🔍 and adds search-specific AI prompt. (5) Deep Research (Telescope) - Functional button that prefixes query with 🔬 and adds research-specific AI prompt. (6) Copy to Clipboard - Implemented with expo-clipboard with Android Toast feedback. (7) Share - Implemented with expo-sharing with availability checking. All packages are latest SDK 55 compatible: expo-camera@55.0.4, expo-clipboard@55.0.4, expo-sharing@55.0.5, expo-image-manipulator@55.0.4, expo-document-picker@55.0.4.
